content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Max Müller. However, regarding the rental price negotiation, let's focus solely on the figures we'll discuss. To begin with, I have an initial proposal of 1250 Euros per month. What do you think about this amount?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation right now because I need time to evaluate my rental budget and compare this offer with other available options in my search.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
